data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scolaro, José Alejandro, Ibargüengoytía, Nora Ruth (2007): A new species of Phymaturus from rocky outcrops in the central steppe of Rio Negro province, Patagonia Argentina (Reptilia: Iguania: Liolaemidae). Zootaxa 1524: 47-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273839
